data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Sinŭiju, North Korea to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sinŭiju, North Korea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Sinŭiju, North Korea.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Sinŭiju, North Korea to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Sinŭiju to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Korean people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help the 5,650 believers in Sinŭiju to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 360,000 citizens of the the state of Sinŭiju.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sinŭiju, North Korea has a population of 360,000.

We estimate Sinŭiju has 5,650 people who might know Jesus, 316 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 354,034 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 5,650 believers in Sinŭiju and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

location.name: Sinŭiju
